title: The Dead Live On
description: This is book IV of The Last Days Series. The story picks up in the shelter and Jack had launched the chem-bombs that were made to eradicate the dead.Jack and his companions are locked in the shelter for the next year with plenty of provisions to survive. Upon further exploration of the shelter, they find that they are trapped with the dead and rescue two people that have been trapped for over a month. Will the new additions to their group help them or hinder them as the day of release draws near?
author: Julie Cooper Brown
